title: Inclusive Science Curriculum Design for Enhancing Self-Awareness in Gifted Male Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Scientific Knowledge and Gifted Education Concept Comprehension
context.additional_context: Learners are 30-something professionals with science-based job competencies who explore how gender stereotypes influence self-perception and inclusive educational environment design.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the correlation between giftedness and gender and propose at least three inclusive educational strategies based on the analysis.
Learners can evaluate the impact of gender on self-perception through scientific case studies and design lesson plans reflecting the findings.
Learners can design learner-engagement activities in blended environments and derive improvements through peer feedback.

resources: Online collaboration tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
